name: Merge Rumble
description: Merge Rumble – Merge units, strategize, and survive endless waves of intense battles! Upgrade your forces, outsmart enemies, and dominate the battlefield in this dynamic merge game.

name: Bag Legends
description: Bag Legends: Hero RPG – Merge heroes, strategize your lineup, and conquer wave-based battles! Upgrade your squad, position units wisely, and unlock powerful rewards in this dynamic auto-battler.

name: Mergemancer
description: Mergemancer Adventure – Merge, upgrade, and defend in this strategic tower defense game! Combine powerful units, place towers wisely, and survive relentless enemy waves.

name: Fire Blob
description: In FireBlob, you control a growing fire creature, burning objects to reach 100% size before time runs out. Create flame loops for explosions, adding a strategic twist to the action.

name: Color Defender
description: Color Defender: TD RPG – A strategic blend of tower defense and RPG! Switch colors for unique abilities, merge upgrades, and unleash powerful combos to defend against endless waves of enemies.
